attributes.action: Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak quit after breaking the law. Party gate fines!
attributes.additional_details: Law is fully enforceable and should and does apply to everyone so they both need to go. A fine is not good enough considering the money they both have while everyone else is struggling.
attributes.background: I want Boris and Rishi to either be sacked or resign for breaking the law while the UK population was in national lockdown and lying to parliament. Law applies to everyone. Nobody is above the law.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
